description: L1 state with SyncDemo deployed and initialized

notes.l2SenderProxy: L1 contract that routes calls TO L2SyncedCounter. Used by L1SyncedCounter and SyncDemo to call/read L2.
notes.l1SenderProxyL2: L2 contract that represents L1SyncedCounter ON L2. msg.sender when L1 calls L2.
notes.syncDemo: Demo contract that reads L2 value, sets L1 value (which syncs to L2), then reads L2 again to verify sync.
